body.p:
Louisville Ky
June 17th 1862
Hon. B Magoffin
Dear Sir: The Rev G S Rogers who will hand you this is not only a man of high respectability, but one of the purest men in our state
He will apply to give you for the purpose of relieving an unfortunate son who is now confined in jail here for an assault
If you can in justice (tempered with mercy) do any thing for him I hope you will. From the papers shown to me it would seem your clemency would not be improper But of that you will Judge

Truly Yr friend
Waller G. Overton
